headline: Emerson Introduces AI-Enabled Guidance to Support Industrial Resilience
summary: Emerson (NYSE: EMR), an industrial technology leader delivering advanced automation solutions, has introduced Guardian™ Virtual Advisor, an AI-powered software solution to support end-to-end lifecycle management. Emerson's Guardian Virtual Advisor combines AI with deep domain expertise to help customers rapidly evaluate and enhance the performance of their automation systems, driving smarter decisions and operational excellence.
